item.description: Istio v0.8ãŒãƒªãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹ã•ã‚ŒãŸã®ã§æ›´æ–°å†…å®¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®è¨˜äº‹ã‚’æ›¸ã“ã†ã¨ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã‚‰ï¼Œã„ã¤ã®ã¾ã«ã‹ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã®AMPå¯¾å¿œã‚’ã—ã¦ã„ãŸï¼ ä½œæ¥­ã®æµã‚Œ ã–ã£ã¨å…¬å¼ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’è¦‹ã‚‹ ã²ãŸã™ã‚‰ä½¿ãˆãªã„ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚„jsã‚’ampã«å¯¾å¿œã—ãŸã‚‚ã®ã«ç½®ãæ›ãˆã‚‹ chromeã®ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ã«#development=1ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦consoleã«validation errorãŒå‡ºã¦ã„ãªã„ã‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ ã²ãŸã™ã‚‰ç›´ã™ å¤‰ãˆãŸãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆ ampç”¨ã®è­˜åˆ¥å­ãŸã¡ã‚’è¿½åŠ cssãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’convertã—ã¦htmlã«åãå‡ºã— jsã‚’å…¨ã¦å–ã‚Šæ‰•ã† hilightjsã¯gist pluginã«å¤‰æ›´ menuã¯sidebar, accordion pluginã«å¤‰æ›´ jump to top buttonã¯animation, position pluginã«å¤‰æ›´ disqusã‚’iframeã«å¤‰æ›´ (ã¾ã è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œãªã„åŸå› ãŒåˆ†ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ imgã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’amp-imgã«å¤‰æ› æ‰€æ„Ÿ ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã¯3ã¤ã ã‘ãªã®ã§ï¼Œæ€ã£ã¦ã„ãŸã‚ˆã‚Šã¯æ¥½ã ã£ãŸï¼ã—ã‹ã—ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸æ•°ãŒå¤šã‹ã£ãŸã‚Šï¼Œjsã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒªãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ãªã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã¯è¾›ãã†ã ãªã¨ã„ã†æ„Ÿã˜ï¼è¡¨ç¤ºã¯ä»¥å‰ã‚ˆã‚Šå¤§å¹…ã«æ—©ããªã£ãŸã®ã§ã—ã‚ã‚ã›ï¼ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã”ã¨ã®metaæƒ…å ±ã®ç”Ÿæˆã¯é¢å€’ã§ã‚„ã£ã¦ã„ãªã„ï¼ references https://www.ampproject.org/ https://www.ampstart.com

item.title: Recap SIG API Machinery Deep Dive - Kubernetes meetup Tokyo #11
item.description: I recapped SIG API Machinery Deep Dive of KubeCon Europe 2018. After that we more deep dive into the CRD validation and versioning. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/recap-api-machinery-deep-dive Event: https://k8sjp.connpass.com/event/85336/ Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MTG5H4J2jHg

item.title: Manage Microservices with Istio - Japan Container Days v18.04
item.description: I’ve developed and operated Microservices over 3 years, and they are gradually larger and more complexity. Managing those microservices is difficult. Istio is a great product! Because it can solve many problems that I faced. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/istiotogong-nimaikurosabisunili-tixiang-kae Event: https://containerdays.jp

item.title: about
item.description: Aya Igarashi (@ladicle) Just here for code? - It’s on Github. I’m working at Z Lab Corp. 8 years software engineer with an experience. Researched and developed highly scalable Container Platform based on Kubernetes. Key programming language skill is Go, Python and Java. My interesting things are operating system and distributed system design. Publication Apr 2019 Docker and Kubernetes for Everyone May 2019 Kubernetes practical guide Sep 2017 Software Design - The mechanism of Internet.

item.title: Setting up the Mistel BAROCCO
item.description: Refalforceæ´¾ã ã£ãŸãŒï¼Œè¦ªæŒ‡ã‚’ã‚‚ã†ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨æœ‰åŠ¹ã«ä½¿ã„ãŸã‹ã£ãŸã®ã¨å¥åº·ã®ãŸã‚åˆ†å‰²ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«ä¹—ã‚Šæ›ãˆã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã—ãŸï¼TopreãŒåˆ†å‰²ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å‡ºã—ã¦ã„ã‚Œã°ãã‚Œã§è§£æ±ºã ã£ãŸã®ã ãŒï¼Œã¾ã ãªã„ã®ã§æ³£ãæ³£ãä»–ã®é¸æŠè‚¢ã‚’æ¨¡ç´¢ï¼æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ‘ã‚¯ãƒˆã‹ã¤æ™®é€šã®ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒœãƒ‰ã«é…åˆ—ãŒè¿‘ã„Mistel BAROCCO RGB White (US)ã‚’é¸æŠã—ãŸï¼ My keyboard layout Figure1. custom keyboard layout å›³1ã¯ç¾åœ¨ä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹keyboard layoutãªã®ã ãŒï¼Œç·‘è‰²ãŒBAROCCOã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦Remapã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚­ãƒ¼ã§ï¼Œé»„è‰²1ã¯xkbã§Remapã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚­ãƒ¼ã‚’ç¤ºã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ï¼BAROCCOã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ æ©Ÿèƒ½ã§ã¯ä¸€éƒ¨ã®ã‚­ãƒ¼ã«åˆ¶ç´„ãŒã‚ã‚‹ãŸã‚ï¼Œã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå½¢ã«è½ã¡ç€ã„ãŸï¼ Upgrade a firmware ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚¦ã‚§ã‚¢ãŒå…¬å¼ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‹ã‚‰ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ãã‚‹ï¼æœ€æ–°ã®Firmwareã¯2018/01/08ã«ãƒªãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹ã•ã‚ŒãŸï¼ USBæŠœãã¨Remapå†…å®¹ãŒæ¶ˆãˆã¦ã—ã¾ã†ã¿ãŸã„ãªãƒã‚°ãŒæ²»ã‚‹ã®ã§åŸºæœ¬çš„2ã«ã¯é©ç”¨ã—ãŸã»ã†ãŒè‰¯ã„ Remap the keyboard layout Remmapæ–¹æ³•ã¯èª¬æ˜æ›¸ã«ä¹—ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŒPDF or ç´™åª’ä½“ã—ã‹ãªãä¸ä¾¿ãªã®ã§ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ï¼ Normal keys Press the Fn + Ctrl Right Press a remapped key Program new values // locked keys are not lighting Press the PN Remap FN and PN keys Press the Fn/PN + Left Shift for 3s Press the Fn/PN key Choose a new position on the keyboard // locked positions are not lighting Change the back light color and style RBGã‚¨ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’è³¼å…¥ã—ãŸã®ã§ã‘ãŸã¾ã—ãå…‰ã‚‰ã›ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹3ï¼PNã‚’ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«ï¼Œå…¨ä½“ã®ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®å¤‰æ›´ã¯5, ã‚­ãƒ¼ã”ã¨ã«è¨­å®šã—ãŸã„å ´åˆã¯9ï¼Œã©ã¡ã‚‰ã‚‚Escã‹ã‚‰ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ‘ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆãŒä½¿ç”¨ã§ãã‚‹ï¼

item.title: Mastodon on Kubernetes - Kubernetes meetup Tokyo #4
item.description: I start to operate Mastdon on my home Kubernetes cluster. Mastdon is a twitter like social networking service. I talked about how to deploy it on the cluster, and how to use Services, PersistentVolumes, CronJobs, and Deployments. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/mastodon-on-kubernetes Event: https://k8sjp.connpass.com/event/53737/ Video: https://youtu.be/GlbPk0mHgcs?t=2h13m52s Code: https://github.com/Ladicle/mastodon-chart

item.title: Monitoring k8s with Prometheus - Prometheus Tokyo Meetup #1
item.description: Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/monitoring-kubernetes-with-prometheus Event: https://prometheus.connpass.com/event/53894/

item.title: Software Design 11æœˆå· - æ–°äººã®ã¨ãã«çŸ¥ã£ã¦ãŠããŸã‹ã£ãŸã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ‰ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ”ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã®ã—ãã¿
item.description: Links Magazine information: http://gihyo.jp/magazine/SD/archive/2016/201611 Store (Amazon): https://www.amazon.co.jp/o/ASIN/B01LBFWJT2/gihyojp-22

item.title: Conatiner Image Architecture - Container type virtualization study #10
item.description: Do you know how to build the Dockerfile? I talked about OCI image specification and docker image architecture for in-depth understanding of the process of building images, probing cache and parsing the Dockerfile. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/container-image-architecture Event: https://ct-study.connpass.com/event/38841/ Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dc0YrpqgNDg

item.title: Container CI & JJB - Jenkins Study #9
item.description: I talked about container CI and how to mange Jenkins jobs in our project. The OpenStack project is using Jenkins Job Builder. It manage a job definition using by YAML files. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/container-ci-and-jenkins-job-builder Event: http://jenkins.connpass.com/event/35030/ Demo Code: https://github.com/Ladicle/jjb-demo

item.title: k8s helm & helmc - Kubernetes meetup Tokyo #2
item.description: I talked about helm and helmc. Helm is a package manager for Kubernetes, and Helm classic is a previous version of it. Helm will be implemented a lot of useful functions in the future, but it isn’t better than helmc for now. That’s why it’s better to manage manifests with helmc and follow the trend of helm. Links Slide: https://speakerdeck.com/ladicle/kubernetes-helm-and-helmc Event: https://k8sjp.connpass.com/event/33508/
